values.description: = Down and on the bottom-left edge of bubble
= Down and on the bottom-right edge of bubble
= Left and at bottom corner of bubble
= Left or right; code decides if arrow on top or bottom corner
= Left or right and in one of the bottom corners of bubble
= Left or right and in one of the top corners of bubble
= Left and at top corner of bubble
= No arrow used; instead, a floating
= Right and at bottom corner of bubble
= Right and at top corner of bubble
= Do not know where to put the arrow; instead, ActiveX control decides where to put arrow or its default position is used
= Upward or downward; code decides if arrow left or right of the bubble
= Upward or downward and on left side of bubble
= Upward or downward and on right side of bubble
= Upward and on the top-left edge of bubble
= Upward and on the top-right edge of bubble
